name: YAML-Framework
summary: Proper YAML support for Objective-C. Based on recommended LibYAML.
description: YAML.framework provides support for YAML (de)serialisation similarly to standard NSPropertyListSerialization. Based on C LibYAML library by Kirill Simonov.
